---
id: pause-record
title: "PauseRecord"
description: "Call this API to pause a recording task. During the pause, audio and video streams, whiteboards, etc. in the room will not be recorded."
api: 
info_path: extended_services/cloud_recording/en/server/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>PauseRecord</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


Call this API to pause a recording task. During the pause, audio and video streams, whiteboards, etc. in the room will not be recorded.

<Warning title="Warning">Only stream mixing recording tasks can be paused through this API.</Warning>

<Note title="Note">Call frequency limit: 10 times/second</Note>

## Request
